title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ian O'Connor on Coach K's Farewell L, UNC's Run, Tiger Masters Watch
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ian O'Connor on Coach K's Farewell L, UNC's Run, Tiger Masters Watch
description:
First, (3:00) Colin gives his take on what the NBA should do about stars taking so many regular season games off, why Kareem Abdul-Jabaar's criticisms of LeBron off the court are off base, and why Bill Belichick has been willing to let players like JC Jackson walk.

Then, Ian O'Connor -- NY Post columnist and author of Coach K: The Rise and Reign of Mike Krzyzewski and Belichick -- and Colin discuss Coach K's post-game reaction to his disappointing Final Four loss to arch rival UNC (15:00), the parallels between Hubert Davis and a young Coach K vs. Dean Smith (25:00), how Coach K's succession plan to Jon Scheyer got push back from the university (31:00), if college basketball can sustain some of the momentum from an incredible tournament (35:00), why it's better to recruit 3-stars instead of 5-stars for most schools (38:00). They also look ahead to Tiger's potential Masters comeback (40:00), if he'll play, and why his 2019 Masters win was the best event Ian's covered in almost four decades (44:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
